duties_responsibilities.duty: Creates and enters new vendors in QuickBooks
Organizes, analyzes, and sorts new invoices for processing from external and internal vendors
Enters new invoices or costs related employee reimbursements into QuickBooks
Works in conjunction with paralegals obtaining approval of invoices
Runs reports regarding pre-approved invoices and log into spreadsheets, along with exporting and formatting
Reconciles vendor statements, in addition to communicating with vendors and service providers to ensure accuracy of all organizational invoices, requesting modification and clarification as required
